education.degree: B.Tech in Electronics and Computer Engineering
education.institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai, India

responsibilities: Performed exploratory data analysis on global terrorism dataset and breast cancer classification using regression techniques.
Used random forest classification for email spam classification model and neural networks for speech emotion recognition model.

projects.title: Sales Prediction Model
projects.description: Developed a model for predicting sales trends using machine learning techniques.

projects.title: S.A.I.L (Student Assistance and Information Liaison)
projects.description: Created an emotion prediction model using EEG analysis.

projects.title: Stock Prediction Neural Network Model
projects.description: Implemented a neural network model to predict stock market trends.

projects.title: Student Portal Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered chatbot for a college student portal using NLP and neural networks.

projects.title: AI Research Model
projects.description: Conducted individual research on AI models.

research_work.description: Explored AI for predicting emotional fluctuations from EEG scans, built a prototype ML model using neural networks with a 93% accuracy, and presented the paper at the International conference on signal processing, computation, electronics, power and telecommunication held on 4 July 2024 in the National Institute of Technology, Puducherry.

Wrote and presented a paper on the implementation of machine learning algorithms in data science at an international conference on 'Innovations and Technological development in electronics, computers and communication' held at SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Ramapuram.
